oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The acquisition of effective writing strategies is essential for students of a foreign language. For students to become capable writers, the explicit teaching of writing appears to be indispensable. Therefore, this paper presents a collaborative storywriting task-based proposal for Primary Education, which focuses on the development of the necessary skills and strategies for effective writing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Graduado en Magisterio en Educación Primaria
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Escribimos cuentos: propuesta de escritura colaborativa mediante el enfoque por tareas para Educación Primaria
Storywriting: a task-based proposal for cooperative writing in Primary Education
